GITLAB_BASE_URL.description: Configure the base url for gitlab (without trailing slash).

GITLAB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Configure the access token to access gitlab.

JIRA_BASE_URL.description: Configure the base url for jira (without trailing slash).

JIRA_USERNAME.description: Configure the username of the jira account.

JIRA_PASSWORD.description: Configure the password of the jira account.

JIRA_HTTPS_PROXY.description: If your jira is only accessible via a proxy, feel free to add it here.

GITLAB_WEBHOOK_TOKEN.description: The secret token, which will be configured on gitlab to make the connection possible.
